name: Monster 4x4
description:
Exclusively for the Nintendo 3DS handheld system

Features

DESTRUCTION: Wreak a trail of havoc and destruction while crushing your opponents under big wheels.
MULTIPLAYER: Take on your friends and unleash mayhem.
CUSTOMIZATION: Power up your 4x4 trucks and create your own style.
3D: The rush and the grit in 3D has never felt more real.
